"Hmm? What's this?<br>How odd, how odd.":
"If Lisa's memory sphere is correct, there appears to be
someone registered as an enemy..."
"Uhh, err... y-you see..."

"You wouldn't happen to be an
intruder, would you?
Did you back for more?"

"Hehehe, Lisa will give you a
warm welcome. It's all thanks to
you, we can fire guns inside the
ship now."

"Huh, it seems the gun won't fire.
Did the gun jam?"

"Wait! Waitwaitwait!
Calm down now!
I'm no longer an enemy!"

"All enemies will say anything
when they beg for their lives."

"Ugh... you do have a point...
And, had you let me go...
I'd say \"You fool!\" and attack
you from behind!"

"But then, you'd see right through
me, then dodge my attack, and
there'd be nothing I could do, but
plead for my life!"
"O-oh, wait, that ain't it!"

"Hey, back me up!
Why are you just standing there?!"

"It was just like how I met her.
Heh, how nostalgic..."

"It feels like it was only
yesterday for me too. She just
jumped at me."

"Brother and sister reminiscing
together!? Rreee, please help me
<%me>!"
"1. This is how it must be done"
"2. But you were my enemy too..."
"What kind of organization is ARKS!"
"This is not a joke!"

"Lisa is curious, you know.
How different would shooting an
Earthling be than shooting an
ARKS feel."

"Wait, does this mean you've shot
an ARKS before?"

"Three of those shootings were
accidental, thus forgivable after all."
"Those were obviously intentional!"

"Ah, how about this? If you're not an
enemy, you can battle against Lisa
and demonstrate your abilities?"

"I'm not going to battle you so
you can shoot me! This conversation
was heading in a way, so that you can
trick me into getting shot at!"
